memberdef.argsstring: (nfs_arg_t *parg, exportlist_t *pexport, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, hash_table_t *ht, struct svc_req *preq, nfs_res_t *pres)
memberdef.name: nfs_Lookup

detaileddescription.para: nfs_Lookup: The NFS PROC2 and PROC3 LOOKUP
Implements the NFS PROC LOOKUP function (for V2 and V3).

parameterdescription.para: [IN] credentials to be used for this request
[IN] pointer to SVC request related to this call
[OUT] pointer to the structure to contain the result of the call

detaileddescription.para: nfs_Lookup_Free: Frees the result structure allocated for nfs_Lookup.
Frees the result structure allocated for nfs_Lookup.
nfs_Lookup_Free: Frees the result structure allocated for nfs_Lookup.
Frees the result structure allocated for nfs_Lookup.
